result.execSummary:
The defendant Duane Edward Lemerand was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).
  • Possession of Methamphetamine St Croix County Case 15CF419, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: Ct#2

miscConds.notes:
Provide DNA Sample.
Comply with any conditions imposed by Agent.
Apply for Pierce County Drug Court and successfully complete the program. 
If the Def is not accepted into the program; Court will reserve 6 months jail to use.

supervisions.notes:
Same as Ct#1
Concurrent with: Ct#1

records.descr: Application for consolidation of criminal charges

records.addlTxt: Order for Consolidation signed by Honorable Edward Vlack
St Croix County case 15CF414 criminal complaint

10:54 Defendant Duane Edward Lemerand in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Duane Edward Lemerand in custody.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Froelich: St Croix County case 15CF419 will be consolidated into this case. Guilty to Ct#1 in 15CF183 and Ct#1 in 15CF419, which will be consolidated into 15CF183. 3 years probation with conditions of applying for Drug Court and comply with sex offender registry. Chapman and Def agree.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to Ct#1 and Ct#2 in the amended information (which is from St Croix County 15CF419 which is consolidate) and will be contained in an amended information; Chapman stipulates to a factual basis.  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty to Ct#1 and Ct#2 which will be contained in an amended information. Froelich: comply with sex offender registry and apply for drug court. Chapman addresses sentencing. 192 days credit. Def addresses the court.  Court: S/W 3 years each count, concurrent: court costs, DNA sample and surcharge, any conditions imposed by Agent, apply for Pierce County Drug Court and successfuly complete the program. If Def is not accepted into the program; Court will reserve 6 months jail to use.   Appeal rights are given to the defendant.
Defendant Duane Edward Lemerand in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Duane Edward Lemerand in custody.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance at 03-17-2016 10:30 am.
